synopsis.text: Nyx, a demoted member of the elite Kingsglaive military force, guards the gates of Insomnia, the capital city of Lucis. The kingdom has been at war with the Niflheim Empire, which seeks to control the last remaining Crystal, a powerful artifact housed within Insomnia's walls. The Kingsglaive, imbued with the magic of their king, defend the city from the empire's relentless assault. As rumors circulate of a peace treaty between the two factions, Nyx's world begins to shift. This CG-animated film, set within the Final Fantasy XV universe, follows the story of King Regis after his son, Prince Noctis, embarks on a journey with his friends. The intertwining tales of father and son unveil a deeper understanding of the game's world and its lore.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
